---
title: "Unlock Protocol and Hats Protocol Integration"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Protocol"
publishDate: "Tue Oct 29 2024 21:20:43 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "This collab brings together two powerful protocols to provide an onchain-native way for managing roles, permissions, and memberships within decentralized organizations."
image: "/images/blog/unlock-protocol-and-hats-protocol-integration/554ad4251619e1946d3961aaf9f09939.jpg"
---

![Unlock Protocol and Hats Protocol Integration](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/554ad4251619e1946d3961aaf9f09939.jpg)

<p>Unlock Protocol has integrated with Hats Protocol! <span data-name="billed_cap" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">ðŸ§¢</span>&nbsp;This collab brings together two powerful protocols to provide an onchain-native way for managing roles, permissions, and memberships within decentralized organizations.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-what-does-hats-protocol-do"><strong>What Does Hats Protocol Do?</strong></h2></div><p>Hats Protocol is a role management system designed for decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs). It allows organizations to define roles (or "hats") with specific permissions and access rights. Hats Protocol ensures that role assignments are dynamic and can adapt to changes in the organization, such as onboarding new members or revoking access when someone leaves.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-what-does-unlock-protocol-do"><strong>What Does Unlock Protocol Do?</strong></h2></div><p>Unlock Protocol is an open-source, decentralized protocol focused on memberships and subscriptions onchain. Unlock enables creators and organizations to offer exclusive access to content, events, or services. Members can purchase or be granted these memberships in a variety of ways, making the process flexible and user-friendly.</p><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-a-new-way-for-daos-to-collaborate">A New Way for DAOs to Collaborate</h2></div><p>This integration is particularly relevant to decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and decentralized communities seeking to streamline their role management and membership processes.</p><p>In these organizations, roles and permissions are fundamental to governance and operational efficiency. Managing these aspects manually can be cumbersome and prone to errors, especially as the organization grows.</p><p>By integrating Unlock Protocol with Hats Protocol, DAOs can automate the assignment of roles and permissions through membership NFTs.</p><p>Members can easily acquire roles by purchasing a membership, which instantly grants them access to necessary workspaces, communication channels, and voting rights.</p><p>This automation not only reduces administrative overhead but also enhances security by ensuring that only authorized members have access.</p><p>For decentralized communities aiming for scalability and efficiency, this integration offers a solution to effectively manage memberships and roles.</p><p></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-protocol-and-hats-protocol-integration/2c7b3ea917bedd3ec5696efdd99441b1.jpg" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="661" nextwidth="1199" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-what-are-the-benefits"><strong>What Are the Benefits?</strong></h2></div><ul><li><p><strong>Seamless Role Assignment</strong>: Members can now acquire roles by purchasing a membership NFT, instantly granting them the associated permissions for a defined period of time.</p></li><li><p><strong>Automated Access Control</strong>: If a membership expires or is canceled, access is automatically revoked, reducing administrative overhead.</p></li><li><p><strong>Flexible Payment Options</strong>: Organizations can set up recurring subscriptions or one-time fees using any ERC20 token.</p></li><li><p><strong>Easy Onboarding</strong>: A unique claim page is automatically generated for each role, simplifying the activation and onboarding process.</p></li><li><p><strong>Transparent and Decentralized</strong>: Both protocols operate on open-source smart contracts, ensuring transparency and security.</p></li></ul><div class="relative header-and-anchor"><h2 id="h-how-to-get-started">How to Get Started</h2></div><p>If you're interested in enhancing your organization's role management and membership systems, now is the perfect time to explore this integration.</p><p>Hats Protocol has created detailed documentation and a walkthrough video that shows how to set up recurring subscriptions or one-time membership fees for roles within your DAO.</p><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="dont-break-out notion-link-token notion-focusable-token notion-enable-hover" href="https://docs.hatsprotocol.xyz/hats-integrations/eligibility-and-accountability-criteria/subscription-or-membership-fee-unlock-protocol">You can see the details here</a>.</p><p></p>
